issue.title: Robot pose relative to the artifact origin available away from staging area

content.raw:
Here is the starting area after spawning with `pose_from_artifact_origin` at \(-7.49, 4.99\):

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2241427637-Screenshot_from_2019-12-27_14-08-57.png)
and at the entrance to the ramp  `pose_from_artifact_origin` at \(-12.35, 11.92\) - different from old version, which had origin at this location:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2421880616-Screenshot_from_2019-12-27_14-11-03.png)
Far down the ramp  `pose_from_artifact_origin` at \(-23.8, 11.4\):

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/787558135-Screenshot_from_2019-12-27_14-29-49.png)
‌
